Consumable.Name: Temporal Tonic
Consumable.Description: A shimmering liquid that seems to flow backwards, grants the drinker a glimpse of future threats.
Consumable.Effects: Grants precognitive sight, revealing enemy positions for 30 seconds
Consumable.UniqueProperties: One-time use; +2 Intelligence for the duration
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Essential for navigating the Labyrinth of Echoes

Consumable.Name: Astral Bloom
Consumable.Description: This rare flower blooms only in starlight, consuming it restores health and enhances astral projection.
Consumable.Effects: Restores 50 Health; temporarily increases astral damage resistance
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Key to surviving the journey through the Astral Fields

Consumable.Name: Chrono Shard
Consumable.Description: A fragment of a collapsed time bubble. Imbues the user's attacks with temporal energy.
Consumable.Effects: Adds time distortion effect to attacks, slowing enemies for 10 seconds
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Used to defeat the Time Wraiths in the Ruins of Hourglass
